TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PartitionManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Deals with the interaction with the chosen storage service. It's able to create checkpoints and list/claim ownership.
Docs.remarks: An instance of a concrete subclass is provided by the user in the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.Processor.PartitionOwnership>> ClaimOwnershipAsync(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.Processor.PartitionOwnership> partitionOwnership) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ClaimOwnershipAsync (partitionOwnership As IEnumerable(Of PartitionOwnership)) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of PartitionOwnership))

Docs.param: An enumerable containing all the ownership to claim.
Docs.summary: Tries to claim a list of specified ownership.
Docs.returns: An enumerable containing the successfully claimed ownership instances.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.Processor.PartitionOwnership>> ListOwnershipAsync (string eventHubName, string consumerGroup);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.Processor.PartitionOwnership>> ListOwnershipAsync(string eventHubName, string consumerGroup) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ListOwnershipAsync (eventHubName As String, consumerGroup As String) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of PartitionOwnership))

Docs.param: The name of the specific Event Hub the ownership are associated with, relative to the Event Hubs namespace that contains it.
The name of the consumer group the ownership are associated with.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a complete ownership list from the chosen storage service.
Docs.returns: An enumerable containing all the existing ownership for the associated Event Hub and consumer group.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task UpdateCheckpointAsync(class Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.Processor.Checkpoint checkpoint) cil managed

Docs.param: The checkpoint containing the information to be stored.
Docs.summary: Updates the checkpoint using the given information for the associated partition and consumer group in the chosen storage service.
Docs.returns: A task to be resolved on when the operation has completed.
